TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ToolTip extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件可创建一个弹出窗口，以便在界面中显示元素的信息。

span.span: Represents a control that creates a pop-up window that displays information for an element in the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是，这意味着它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或一个面板） 的单个对象。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 您使用控件向用户提供信息。You use a control to provide information to the user. 例如，可以使用提供的名称或中。For example, you can use a to provide the name of a or a in a . 内容控件可以因简单文本字符串更复杂的内容如具有嵌入的文本和图像。The content of a control can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a that has embedded text and images. 内容不能接收焦点。The content of a cannot receive focus. 一个控件不能具有父级。A control cannot have a parent. 例如，不能设置的属性到相反，分配到和属性。For example, you cannot set the property of a to a Instead, assign a to the and properties. 可以使用针对通过定义多个元素中。You can use a on multiple elements by defining a in a . 属性类用于定义的位置和工具提示的行为。The properties of the class are used to define the position and behavior of the tooltip. 中也定义了其中的许多属性类。Many of these properties are also defined in the class. 如果由指定的其中一个属性的值属性和的附加属性的值使用属性。If the value of one of these properties is specified by both the property and the attached property, the value of the property is used. 此外，类提供了用于设置计时行为的属性。In addition, the class provides properties to set timing behavior. 这些附加的属性都不包含在类，但可由该控件。These attached properties are not included in the class but can be used by the control. ## 自定义工具提示控件Customizing the ToolTip Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[ToolTip 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToolTip Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义的工具提示控件元素。The following examples shows how to define a tooltip control for a element. 下面的示例演示如何通过将文本分配给定义工具提示属性。The following example shows how to define a tooltip by assigning text to the property. [!code-xaml[ToolTipSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示如何通过分配定义工具提示对象传递给属性。The following example shows how to define a tooltip by assigning a object to the property. [!code-xaml[ToolTipSimple#ToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#tooltip)] 以下示例使用代码来生成对象。The following example uses code to generate a object. 此示例将创建(`tt`) 并将其与。The example creates a (`tt`) and associates it with a . [!code-csharp[ToolTipSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ToolTipSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于放置此 的委托处理程序方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the delegate handler method to use to position the .

value.span: 提供 的放置信息的 委托方法。

span.span: The delegate method that provides placement information for the .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为为要使用的回调委托。The property must be set to for the callback delegate to be used. 委托返回的可能与定义的点数组。The delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the . 当是显示，选中了一点来最大化的量是可见的窗口。When the is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the window that is visible. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性并创建对应的委托。The following example shows how to set the property and create the corresponding delegate. 相同的方法将由，这中所示[Popup 放置示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032)。The same technique is used to by the , which is demonstrated in the [Popup Placement Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032). [!code-csharp[ToolTipCustom#CustomPopupPlacementCallback](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#custompopupplacementcallback)] [!code-vb[ToolTipCustom#CustomPopupPlacementCallback](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#custompopupplacementcallback)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipCustom#DelegateInstance](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#delegateinstance)] [!code-vb[ToolTipCustom#DelegateInstance](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#delegateinstance)]

value.span: 一个 枚举值，用于确定 控件打开时的方向，并指定此控件如何与屏幕边界交互。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示打开的 是否一直保持打开状态，直到用户在鼠标不在 上时单击鼠标。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an open remains open until the user clicks the mouse when the mouse is not over the .

value.span: 如果 一直保持打开状态，直到用户在 之外单击鼠标按钮关闭它，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the stays open until it is closed by the user clicking the mouse button outside the ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为`false`有关不支持属性时未打开。A value of `false` for the property is not supported for a when it is not open. 若要创建保持打开状态直到超出工具提示时按下鼠标按钮的工具提示，您必须同时设置属性和属性设置为`true`。To create a tooltip that stays open until the mouse button is pressed when it is outside the tooltip, you must set both the property and the property to `true`. 如果设置为`false`时未打开，请在工具提示时发生。If is set to `false` when the tooltip is not open, a occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

exception.span: 当没有打开工具提示且 设置为 时发生。

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅[Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

value.span: 默认值为 0。
